Primary buttons: primary-600 bg, hover primary-700 + translateY
Destructive buttons: color-error bg, hover error-dark
Button sizes: sm 32px, md 36px, lg 44px
Focus ring: 2px outline primary-500
Disabled: opacity 0.5, cursor-not-allowed
Cards: bg-card, border-secondary, radius-xl, space-6
Interactive cards: hover border-primary + shadow + translateY
Inputs: bg-input, border-primary, radius-lg, 36px
Input focus: border-focus + blue ring
Input error: red border + red ring
Placeholder: text-tertiary
Table headers: bg-tertiary, text-xs, uppercase
Table rows: text-sm, border-secondary, hover bg-hover
Badges: pill, text-xs, semantic 15% opacity bg
Toasts: bg-elevated, border-primary, shadow-lg, 380px
Modals: overlay blur, bg-elevated, radius-xl
Modal footer: right-aligned, space-3 gap
Empty states: centered, 48px icon, text-lg title
Color contrast 4.5:1 for text in dark theme
Color contrast 4.5:1 for text in light theme
UI component contrast 3:1
Visible focus indicators on all interactive elements
Theme toggle ARIA labels and aria-pressed
Font size button ARIA label and announcements
Modal focus trap
Toast role="status"
Sidebar icon-only at 1024-1280px
Sidebar hamburger drawer below 1024px
Tables hide secondary columns at 1024-1280px
Tables horizontal scroll at 768-1024px
CSS custom properties for cross-framework tokens
Design tokens importable in React and Lit
Synchronous theme detection in head
Font size modifies documentElement.style.fontSize
Tailwind uses var(--token) syntax
Shadow DOM token injection for Lit components
Preserve CyberDemo custom CSS animations
Build size increase less than 50KB from tokens + fonts
font-display: swap for web fonts
No hardcoded hex colors after migration
Shared design-tokens.css between CyberDemo and Medicum
Files Manager consumes same token values
All apps respond to data-theme attribute
Consistent font loading across apps
Lucide icons available in all apps
localStorage theme-preference: dark/light/system
localStorage font-size-step: 0/1/2
Per-origin localStorage scoping
No sensitive data in localStorage
Theme switch latency less than 300ms
Font size change latency less than 100ms
No FOUC on page load
100% feature parity across themes
Graceful localStorage fallback
No sensitive data in localStorage
No XSS vectors in theme/font handling
Token system extensible for future projects
Framework-agnostic CSS token architecture
WCAG 2.2 AA compliance both themes
Consistent keyboard navigation
Per-project preference persistence
